tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE student_records (
 student_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
 student_name TEXT NOT NULL,
 student_email TEXT UNIQUE,
 student_phone TEXT,
 certification_id INTEGER REFERENCES certification_details(certification_id),
 course_id INTEGER REFERENCES course_history(course_id)
);

CREATE TABLE student_records (
    student_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    student_name VARCHAR(50),
    date_of_birth DATE,
    contact_number VARCHAR(15),
    address TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE program_certifications (
    certification_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    student_id INT,
    certification_name VARCHAR(50),
    certification_date DATE,
    FOREIGN KEY (student_id) REFERENCES student_records(student_id)
);

CREATE TABLE certification_details (
    certification_id INT NOT NULL,
    certification_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    certification_date DATE,
    student_id INT NOT NULL,
    PRIMARY KEY (certification_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (student_id) REFERENCES student_records(student_id)
);

CREATE TABLE course_history (
    course_id INT NOT NULL,
    course_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    course_date DATE,
    student_id INT NOT NULL,
    certification_id INT NOT NULL,
    PRIMARY KEY (course_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (student_id) REFERENCES student_records(student_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (certification_id) REFERENCES certification_details(certification_id)
);

CREATE TABLE student_records (
    student_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    first_name VARCHAR(50),
    last_name VARCHAR(50),
    email VARCHAR(100),
    phone_number VARCHAR(20)
);

CREATE TABLE course_history (
    history_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    student_id INT,
    course_name VARCHAR(100),
    course_date DATE,
    instructor VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE teacher_training_programs (
    program_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    program_name VARCHAR(100),
    program_duration INT,
    lead_instructor VARCHAR(50),
    location VARCHAR(100)
);

CREATE TABLE student_records (
    student_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    first_name VARCHAR(50),
    last_name VARCHAR(50),
    email VARCHAR(100),
    phone_number VARCHAR(20)
);

CREATE TABLE course_history (
    course_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    course_name VARCHAR(50),
    instructor VARCHAR(50),
    start_date DATE,
    completion_date DATE
);
